are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_lis: Are you sure you want to delete this listing permanently?
purchase_listing_sponsor_completed: Your purchase to sponsor your listing has just been made successfully.
purchase_listing_sponsor_pending_approva: Your purchase to sponsor your listing has just been made successfully however it is pending an Admins approval.
select_an_action_to_apply_for_all_listin: Select an action to apply for all listings as well as sub categories belonging to this category
remove_all_listings_and_sub_categories_b: Remove all listings and sub-categories belonging to this category
select_another_category_to_move_all_list: Select another category to move all listings and sub-categories belonging to this category.
unable_to_find_the_listing_you_want_to_e: Unable to find the listing you want to edit
maximum_photos_you_can_upload_is_number: Maximum photos you can upload is: {number}
seo_marketplace_meta_description: Sell your product, search and buy product
cannot_find_the_uploaded_photo_please_tr: Cannot find the uploaded photo. Please try again
you_do_not_have_sufficient_permission_to: You do not have sufficient permission to delete this listing.
